channel.title: Possibly the best game ever?
channel.description:
Was watching some videos on a game called Facade, what happens is that one guy named "Trip" invites you over to a little party in his apartment with his wife. You go over to find that they have a failing marriage and spark into argument, but you can either play the game seriously or do what is more common (fuck around with them).
Here's a video: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-I889IN4ePs[/youtube]
It's free and it's fun to screw around in.
